title: MicrobiomeBenchmarkData
text: MicrobiomeBenchamrkData package provides collection datasets suitable benchmarking differential abundance methods R. datasets also available Zenodo (sandbox) can downloaded used R environment preferred/needed. main characteristic collection datasets contain biological truth proved experimentally literature.

title: MicrobiomeBenchmarkData
text: MicrobiomeBenchmarkData available BioConductor project.
code: # if (!"BiocManager" %in% installed.packages()[,"Package"]) # install.packages("BiocManager")  ## Release version # BiocManager::install("MicrobiomeBenchmarkData")  ## Development version # BiocManager::install("waldronlab/MicrobiomeBenchmarkData") library(MicrobiomeBenchmarkData)

title: MicrobiomeBenchmarkData
text: Currently, 6 datasets available MicrobiomeBenchmarkData. datasets accessed getDataset function.

title: MicrobiomeBenchmarkData
text: arguments provided, list available datasets printed screen returned invisiby character vector:
code: dats <- getDataset() #> 1 HMP_2012_16S_gingival_V13 #> 2 HMP_2012_16S_gingival_V35 #> 3 HMP_2012_16S_gingival_V35_subset #> 4 HMP_2012_WMS_gingival #> 5 Stammler_2016_16S_spikein #> 6 Ravel_2011_16S_BV #>  #> Use vignette('datasets', package = 'MicrobiomeBenchmarkData') for a detailed description of the datasets. #>  #> Use getDataset(dryrun = FALSE) to import all of the datasets. dats #> [1] "HMP_2012_16S_gingival_V13"        "HMP_2012_16S_gingival_V35"        #> [3] "HMP_2012_16S_gingival_V35_subset" "HMP_2012_WMS_gingival"            #> [5] "Stammler_2016_16S_spikein"        "Ravel_2011_16S_BV"

title: MicrobiomeBenchmarkData
text: order import dataset, getDataset function must used name dataset first argument (x) dryrun argument set FALSE. output list vector dataset imported TreeSummarizedExperiment object.
code: tse <- getDataset('HMP_2012_16S_gingival_V35_subset', dryrun = FALSE)[[1]] #> Finished HMP_2012_16S_gingival_V35_subset. tse #> class: TreeSummarizedExperiment  #> dim: 892 76  #> metadata(0): #> assays(1): counts #> rownames(892): OTU_97.31247 OTU_97.44487 ... OTU_97.45365 OTU_97.45307 #> rowData names(7): kingdom phylum ... genus taxon_annotation #> colnames(76): 700023057 700023179 ... 700114009 700114338 #> colData names(9): dataset subject_id ... library_size body_subiste #> reducedDimNames(0): #> mainExpName: NULL #> altExpNames(0): #> rowLinks: a LinkDataFrame (892 rows) #> rowTree: 1 phylo tree(s) (892 leaves) #> colLinks: NULL #> colTree: NULL

title: MicrobiomeBenchmarkData
text: Several datasets can imported simultaneously giving names different datasets character vector:
code: list_tse <- getDataset(dats[2:4], dryrun = FALSE) #> Finished HMP_2012_16S_gingival_V35. #> Finished HMP_2012_16S_gingival_V35_subset. #> Finished HMP_2012_WMS_gingival. str(list_tse, max.level = 1) #> List of 3 #>  $ HMP_2012_16S_gingival_V35       :Formal class 'TreeSummarizedExperiment' [package "TreeSummarizedExperiment"] with 14 slots #>  $ HMP_2012_16S_gingival_V35_subset:Formal class 'TreeSummarizedExperiment' [package "TreeSummarizedExperiment"] with 14 slots #>  $ HMP_2012_WMS_gingival           :Formal class 'TreeSummarizedExperiment' [package "TreeSummarizedExperiment"] with 14 slots

title: MicrobiomeBenchmarkData
text: datasets must imported, can done providing dryrun = FALSE argument alone.
code: mbd <- getDataset(dryrun = FALSE) #> Finished HMP_2012_16S_gingival_V13. #> Finished HMP_2012_16S_gingival_V35. #> Finished HMP_2012_16S_gingival_V35_subset. #> Finished HMP_2012_WMS_gingival. #> Warning: No taxonomy_tree available for Ravel_2011_16S_BV. #> Finished Ravel_2011_16S_BV. #> Warning: No taxonomy_tree available for Stammler_2016_16S_spikein. #> Finished Stammler_2016_16S_spikein. str(mbd, max.level = 1) #> List of 6 #>  $ HMP_2012_16S_gingival_V13       :Formal class 'TreeSummarizedExperiment' [package "TreeSummarizedExperiment"] with 14 slots #>  $ HMP_2012_16S_gingival_V35       :Formal class 'TreeSummarizedExperiment' [package "TreeSummarizedExperiment"] with 14 slots #>  $ HMP_2012_16S_gingival_V35_subset:Formal class 'TreeSummarizedExperiment' [package "TreeSummarizedExperiment"] with 14 slots #>  $ HMP_2012_WMS_gingival           :Formal class 'TreeSummarizedExperiment' [package "TreeSummarizedExperiment"] with 14 slots #>  $ Ravel_2011_16S_BV               :Formal class 'TreeSummarizedExperiment' [package "TreeSummarizedExperiment"] with 14 slots #>  $ Stammler_2016_16S_spikein       :Formal class 'TreeSummarizedExperiment' [package "TreeSummarizedExperiment"] with 14 slots

what: Annotations for each taxa are included in rowData
title: MicrobiomeBenchmarkData
text: biological annotations taxa provided column rowData slot TreeSummarizedExperiment.
code: ## In the case, the column is named as BIOSIS tse <- mbd$HMP_2012_16S_gingival_V35_subset rowData(tse) #> DataFrame with 892 rows and 7 columns #>                  kingdom      phylum       class           order #>              <character> <character> <character>     <character> #> OTU_97.31247    Bacteria  Firmicutes     Bacilli Lactobacillales #> OTU_97.44487    Bacteria  Firmicutes     Bacilli Lactobacillales #> OTU_97.34979    Bacteria  Firmicutes     Bacilli Lactobacillales #> OTU_97.34572    Bacteria  Firmicutes     Bacilli Lactobacillales #> OTU_97.42259    Bacteria  Firmicutes     Bacilli Lactobacillales #> ...                  ...         ...         ...             ... #> OTU_97.44294    Bacteria  Firmicutes     Bacilli Lactobacillales #> OTU_97.45429    Bacteria  Firmicutes     Bacilli Lactobacillales #> OTU_97.44375    Bacteria  Firmicutes     Bacilli Lactobacillales #> OTU_97.45365    Bacteria  Firmicutes     Bacilli Lactobacillales #> OTU_97.45307    Bacteria  Firmicutes     Bacilli Lactobacillales #>                        family         genus      taxon_annotation #>                   <character>   <character>           <character> #> OTU_97.31247 Streptococcaceae Streptococcus facultative_anaerobic #> OTU_97.44487 Streptococcaceae Streptococcus facultative_anaerobic #> OTU_97.34979 Streptococcaceae Streptococcus facultative_anaerobic #> OTU_97.34572 Streptococcaceae Streptococcus facultative_anaerobic #> OTU_97.42259 Streptococcaceae Streptococcus facultative_anaerobic #> ...                       ...           ...                   ... #> OTU_97.44294 Streptococcaceae Streptococcus facultative_anaerobic #> OTU_97.45429 Streptococcaceae Streptococcus facultative_anaerobic #> OTU_97.44375 Streptococcaceae Streptococcus facultative_anaerobic #> OTU_97.45365 Streptococcaceae Streptococcus facultative_anaerobic #> OTU_97.45307 Streptococcaceae Streptococcus facultative_anaerobic

text: datasets cached ’re downloaded . cache files contained can removed removeCache function.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Samuel David Gamboa Tuz. Author, maintainer.

what: Datasets for benchmarking in microbiome research
title: Datasets for benchmarking in microbiome research
text: resource datasets biological ground truth benchmarking differential abundance methods. datasets also available Zenodo https://sandbox.zenodo.org/deposit/952241 (provisional link sandbox zenodo).

title: Datasets for benchmarking in microbiome research
code: if (!"BiocManager" %in% installed.packages()[,"Package"])     install.packages("BiocManager")  ## Development version BiocManager::install("waldronlab/MicrobiomeBenchmarkData", build_vignettes = TRUE)

title: MicrobiomeBenchmarkData — MicrobiomeBenchmarkData
text: MicrobiomeBenchmarkData provide functions accessing various datasets.

title: Assemble TreeSummarizedExperiment — .assembleTreeSummarizedExperiment
text: .assembleTreeSummarizedExperiment assembles TreeSummarizedDataset taking input name dataset URL. helper function getDataset function.

title: Assemble TreeSummarizedExperiment — .assembleTreeSummarizedExperiment
text: dat_name character string name dataset. dat_url character string URL Zenodo.

title: Assemble TreeSummarizedExperiment — .assembleTreeSummarizedExperiment
text: TreeSummarizedExperiment

title: Get cache — .getCache
text: .getCache creates loads cache store files downloaded MicrobiomeBenchmarkData package.

title: Get cache — .getCache
text: BiocFileCache object.

title: Get resource path — .getResourcePath
text: .getResource downloads count matrix store cache.

title: Get resource path — .getResourcePath
text: resource_name character string name dataset. resource_url character string URL Zenodo.

title: Get resource path — .getResourcePath
text: character string containing path count matrix cache.

title: Get dataset — getDataset
text: getDataset imports datasets TreeSummarizedExperiment objects.

title: Get dataset — getDataset
text: x character vector name(s) dataset(s). empty dryrun = TRUE, returns message names available datasets. empty dryrun = FALSE, returns list TreeSummarizedExperiments datasets. dryrun TRUE, returns message invisibly returns names datasets character vector. FALSE, returns TreeSummarizedExperiment datasets indicated argument 'x'.

title: Get dataset — getDataset
text: list TreeSummarizedExperiments.

title: Get dataset — getDataset
code: datasets_names <- getDataset() #> 1 HMP_2012_16S_gingival_V13 #> 2 HMP_2012_16S_gingival_V35 #> 3 HMP_2012_16S_gingival_V35_subset #> 4 HMP_2012_WMS_gingival #> 5 Stammler_2016_16S_spikein #> 6 Ravel_2011_16S_BV #>  #> Use vignette('datasets', package = 'MicrobiomeBenchmarkData') for a detailed description of the datasets. #>  #> Use getDataset(dryrun = FALSE) to import all of the datasets. datasets <- getDataset("HMP_2012_16S_gingival_V35_subset", dryrun = FALSE) #> Finished HMP_2012_16S_gingival_V35_subset.

title: Remove cache — removeCache
text: removeCache removes files saved cache. ask confirmation removing cache.

title: Remove cache — removeCache
text: NULL cache contents removed.

title: sampleMetadata — sampleMetadata
text: data frame combined metadata samples datasets provided MicrobiomeBenchmarkData.

title: sampleMetadata — sampleMetadata
text: data.frame.

title: Changes in version 0.99.0 (2021-09-26)
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package.
